vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωρείμ, ὁ
indecl.,
Jorim: Luk.3:29.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.29;
son of: Matthat (G3158H);
father of: Eliezer (G1663)
§ Jorim, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:29*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約令 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "耶和華所高舉的"
瑪塔的兒子, 耶穌基督的家譜 (路 3:29)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约令 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "耶和华所高举的"
玛塔的儿子, 耶稣基督的家谱 (路 3:29)
